name: Stephanie Mann
offering: Podcast Host, Public Speaking, Speaker Training, Speaking Opportunities, Spiritual Coaching
what_you_do: Stephanie L. Mann is an author and crime prevention consultant who empowers citizens and leaders to create safe and healthy neighborhoods through her work with Safe Kids Now, including hosting a radio and TV program addressing issues like child abuse and violence.
who_you_serve: She serves community leaders, parents, and organizations focused on child safety and crime prevention.
signature_programs: Safe Neighborhoods Program, multiple safety and crime prevention books
bio: Woman of Distinction for Outstanding Leadership, Citizen of the Year, over 160 media appearances
business_focus: Stephanie L. Mann is an author and crime prevention consultant who empowers citizens and leaders to create safe and healthy neighborhoods through her work with Safe Kids Now, including hosting a radio and TV program addressing issues like child abuse and violence.
